entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fixed VK refresh token
New release for Postiz: Add env Key for API Threshold
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Option to merge all comments into one post by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/719
  • Added env Variable API_LIMITto set the maximum requests per user per hour for the public API

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.40.1...v1.41.0

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix LinkedIn repost
entry.content:
Linkedin didn't repost with the plugs. We have changed the route from v2 back to rest.
